  • Method Details

    • getAllCities

      public static List<String> getAllCities() throws FileNotFoundException
      This method process a locally persistent data chunk of a list of all cities on any flight route and it in a Java List.
      Returns:
      a list of all cities on any flight route
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - when the descriptor file not found

    • getCity

      public String getCity(String AirportCode) throws FileNotFoundException
      Provide the city an airport lies by reads an airport-city relation chunk file locally.
      Parameters:
      AirportCode - specifies an airport by its IATA code
      Returns:
      the city the airport is in
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - when no flight information file found

    • searchForFlights

      public List<Flight> searchForFlights(String departure, String destination, String date)
      Filters flights according to the given departure, destination and date criteria.
      Parameters:
      departure - the departure city
      destination - the destination city
      date - the departure date
      Returns:
      a list of flights matching the given criteria
